akn:content.akn:p: (a) Short title This section may be cited as the “National Advisory Committee on Semiconductor Research and Development Act of 1988”.

(c) Creation of Committee There is hereby created in the executive branch of the Government an independent advisory body to be known as the National Advisory Committee on Semiconductors (hereafter in this section referred to as the “Committee”).

(f) Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out the purposes of this section such sums as may be necessary for the fiscal years 1988, 1989, 1990, 1991, 1992, and 1993.
